keep_running_app_description: Adding, Tagging & save images in database when app in background or closed
background_backup_description: Send images to cloud when app in background
permission_storage_description: This application requests access to the internal memory for proper processing and operation! Do you allow it ?
system_permission_limit_description: The number of requests for this access has been maximized and the system will not allow re-requests, please enable this access through the application settings in the system.
please_allow_notification_messages: Please allow notification messages, this required for working app on background and send task information's to you. Do you allow it ?
background_access_description:
Allowing "Smart Gallery" to always run in the background may reduce battery life.

You can change this later from Settings > Apps & notifications
notification_permission_desc: This app can launch with notification permission. in other conditions, app is not launch. Do you allow it ?
